title: New Hope Consistently Making Higher Highs
name: zAngus
contents:
New Hope is another coal miner similar to ASX:WHC that is just consistently posting higher highs.

Correct CODE is NHC .

Could be worth a look.

title: GBPUSD 4Hrs (TP/Down +110 Pips) Expecting 400 Pips
name: AkhiPrajapati
contents:
Pair Name : GBPUSD
TimeFrame : 4Hrs
Direction : Short
Type : Swing
Target Range : 400 Pips
(TP/Down +110 Pips) Expecting 400 Pips
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Neat and clean chart with clear setup, no junk on chart.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you like this idea, then smash like button and follow us for regular updates.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note:- Do you own due diligence before taking any trades.
Thanks

title: $BTC.X Analysis, Key levels, and Targets
name: LadyAmalthea12
contents:
$BTC.X Analysis, Key levels, and Targets

So here is Bitcoin’s chart in logarithmic view. I finally bought some bitcoin again even though I was definitely waiting for 13k but honestly, I think this is a great place to start accumulating again.

I sold up in the 57’s and that was a heck of a drop but I’m finally feeling comfortable to start again here. And now that I’m back in I’ll start posting both trade plans and also accumulation plans.

I did not get a huge position here, I’m really just starting, and I’m not in a hurry… I don’t think we are rallying to ATH’s anytime soon, lol…
And with all of the crazy currency stuff going on world wide, it just feels like a good time to start accumulating a little here and a little there again…

I also bought some DOGE.X and I’ll upload that chart soon… looking into ETH again too... I’m exhausted tonight though so this is what I’ve got tonight… Next bitcoin chart will have more targets and levels… tonight i just don't wanna... 🤣

title: $NIO - Bearish leading Indications
name: TheTradingStar
contents: A major bearish F-Flag has formed, could see a break down to less than $1 support area . Also corresponds to the mountain top formation as well.

title: CadJpy- Where to sell?
name: Mihai_Iacob
contents:
The long-term trend for CadJpy is up for quite some time and although I don't expect this to change soon, at this moment a deeper correction could follow.
The recent break above 108 is a false one and this can lead to a break down of the trend line support.
108 remains strong resistance and in this zone, traders should look for selling opportunities.
As a target, the horizontal 102 level can serve as a target and a break above 110 negates this scenario.

title: AMD Analysis
name: Keeleytwj
contents: Price did not play out as expected from my last analysis. I was expecting price to fill the fair value gap at 64.05 and go up to mitigate the bearish POI at 85.68 before going lower. Price went lower regardless and is heading towards the bullish POI at 54.74. I'm expecting a bullish retracement after hitting the bullish POI at 54.74, potentially to fill the fair value gap/ bearish POI at 64.52.

title: EurAud facing important resistance
name: Mihai_Iacob
contents:
After reaching my 1.52 target, EurAud continued its ascent and now is very near an important resistance.
Although now the long-term trend is changed and is clearly up, a correction from this level can follow.
The target for such correction is the old 1.52 zone resistance

title: NFLX Analysis
name: Keeleytwj
contents: Price playing out as analyzed over the past few weeks. Price did not take the highs at 251.99 and broke market structure to the downside. I'm expecting price to potentially target the bullish POI at 190.21 before we see any bullish retracement.

title: WTICOUSD (SUPPORT/RESISTANCE ZONE)
name: shiyishiyi
contents:
After a long bull run, finally it has showed some retracement and it has enter a new created support zone .
It looks promising and I am taking a long trade ! BUY!

title: EURUSD Potential for Bearish Continuation | 12th October 2022
name: desmondlzw
contents:
The EURUSD has a bearish bias on the H4 chart. Looking for a breakout sell entry at 0.9695, where the 61.8% Fibonacci retracement sits. The stop loss will be set at 0.9870 at the overlapping resistance. The take profit point will be at 0.9545, where the swing low and 161.8% extension sits

title: USDCHF Potential for Bullish Continuation | 12 October 2022
name: desmondlzw
contents:
We have a bullish bias on USDCHF on the H4 chart. Prices are trading above the Ichimoku cloud indicating a slightly bullish market. Looking for a break out buy entry at 0.9970 where the swing high,127.2% extension sits. The stop loss will be set at 0.9868, which is the previous low and the overlap support sits. Take profit will be at 1.0050, where the swing high is situated.

title: BTCUSD Potential for Bearish Continuation| 12th October 2022
name: desmondlzw
contents:
On the H4 chart, we have a bearish bias on BTCUSD . To add to this bias, the price is below the Ichimoku cloud , which implies a bearish market. Looking for a sell entry at 20463.26, where 50% Fibonacci retracement sits. Stop loss will be at 21631.46, at the 78.6% Fibonacci retracement level. The take profit point will be around 18546.84 where the previous swing low sits

title: Bitcoin Trend Analytics October 12
name: BitMidas
contents:
Similar to the analysis yesterday, BTC is about to leave the channel and develop into new sideway patterns.

Yesterday BTC went down to test $18798.44, with short-term capital inflow. The price dropped with increasing fund outflow and in the next 5 hours saw small capital inflow. The latter is larger than the former, so the price is kept at this level. But the inflow is not enough to form a reversal at the moment.

Monitor this area - if the support is broken down, BTC could slide down. Set protections.

$19882.81 is still a battleground. Only by taking hold of it could it reach neutral or the movement is still bearish .

Now the price is pegged to 19k with shrinking volumes. BTC could possibly survive the release of CPI .

The market expected interest rate hike in November: 75bp(77.7%),50bp(22.3%)

title: BTC Outlook
name: miladchikol
contents:
According to LSMA , we can assume that Bitcoin has ended the bear market.

LSMA is a technical analysis tool that studies past market data, such as the price and trading volume , and uses it to predict the future direction of an asset’s price.

I have put this indicator in 2 different bear markets' ends of 2015, 2019 and the current year 2022.

2015: The indicator was in a pass between below and above the price. It finally stayed at the same level at the bottom, while price stayed above it and bear market ended.

2019: The indicator went below the price again after short cycles and bear market ended.

2022: The indicator looks thoroughly like 2015's situation, except the bottom which is similar to 2019's where was a rapid recovery. Price is currently staying above the indicator.
